description: Allows users to develop and publish database schemas for MSSQL Databases
sqlDatabaseProjects.description: Design and publish SQL database schemas
sqlDatabaseProjects.generateProjectFromO: Generate SQL Project from OpenAPI/Swagger spec
sqlDatabaseProjects.netCoreInstallLocati: Full path to .NET Core SDK on the machine.
sqlDatabaseProjects.netCoreDoNotAsk: Whether to prompt the user to install .NET Core when not detected.
sqlDatabaseProjects.netCoreDowngradeDoNo: Whether to prompt the user to set .NET SDK version when a newer unsupported version is detected.
sqlDatabaseProjects.nodejsDoNotAsk: Whether to prompt the user to install Node.js when not detected.
sqlDatabaseProjects.autorestSqlVersion: Which version of Autorest.Sql to use from NPM.  Latest will be used if not set.
sqlDatabaseProjects.welcome:
No database projects currently open.
[New Project](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.new)
[Open Project](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.open)
[Create Project From Database](command:sqlDatabaseProjects.importDatabase)
